pr_title: Fixing NPE when calling toString on an EnhancedType built using documentOf

timeline.bodyText: Can we rephrase this to what the new behavior is (no longer throws an NPE...), as opposed to what the problem was?
timeline.author: millems
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,5 @@
+{
+    "category": "Amazon DynamoDB Enhacned", 
+    "type": "bugfix", 
+    "description": "innerToString method inside EnhancedType raises a NPE when built using documentOf as `rawClassParameters` is set to `null`."

timeline.message: Fixing NPE when calling toString on an EnhancedType built using documentOf
Fixing NPE when calling toString on an EnhancedType built using documentOf
